feature.label: Feature which holds the executables
feature.description: This feature contains the launcher from equinox.executable. Install this feature into your target platform to resolve all requirements needed for installing the Riena components. DO NOT INSTALL this feature into your Eclipse IDE. Only install it into your target platform.
